title: NO SOUND IN KEEN 5 & 6
content: I installed Keen 5 & 6 and have no sound.  I had the same trouble with Wolfenstein 3D.  What can I do?

title: Re: NO SOUND IN KEEN 5 & 6
content:
If you're on XP, use DOSBOX.-----
[img]http://gnosticus.spatang.com/PBF056BCPuppyWish.jpg[/img]

title: Re: NO SOUND IN KEEN 5 & 6
content: I am using window xp but I am a blonde--what is DOXBOS

title: Re: NO SOUND IN KEEN 5 & 6
content:
It's DOSbox, not DOXbos [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img]

Anyway, its a program that runs DOS programs.
Im not sure what the website is to get it, though.

Alternatively you could use a program called VDMsound (get it off [url=http://www.dosclassics.com/keen/dl.php]Here[/url])[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: NO SOUND IN KEEN 5 & 6
content:
saw on another topic post where to download that DOSBOX
but once I download it what do I do with it. I downloaded it, installed it and went to play Keen and it was still without sound. what now?

title: Re: NO SOUND IN KEEN 5 & 6
content:
Just drag the Commander Keen icon over the DOSbox icon.-----
[img]http://gnosticus.spatang.com/PBF056BCPuppyWish.jpg[/img]

title: Re: NO SOUND IN KEEN 5 & 6
content: Also check if you've got sound effects/ music/ whatever you need/ enabled in the configuration menu of whichever Keen game you're playing - the solution to my sound problems mulitple times...[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: NO SOUND IN KEEN 5 & 6
content: Also remember that PC speaker plays through the regular speaker in DOSbox.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: NO SOUND IN KEEN 5 & 6
content: Thanks for the help but nothing seems to work.  I must have something really messed up.  I am basically illeterate when it comes to computers.  I push buttons and it is supposed to work--I know nothing more than that.
